Targets “between” the IR and VDSOL

  • Equations - can we take an ODE of a compartmental model and synthesize graphical representations and IR?

Given the SIR model:

Some observations:

  • Compartments are identified in the left hand side of the equations. implies a compartment exists.
  • Right hand sides are lists of additive events. gives us two transitions, one which removes from at rate with predicate and one which adds to at rate and predicate .
